# 1. Getting Started

## 1.1 Install and launching the R packages

```{r}
pacman::p_load(tmap, sf, tidyverse)
```

## 1.2 Preparing the Flow Data

### 1.2.1 Importing the OD data

Firstly, we will import the *Passenger Volume by Origin Destination Bus Stops* data set downloaded from LTA DataMall by

```{r}
odbus <- read.csv("data/origin_destination_bus_202308.csv")
```
